personalInfo.title_academic: Finance Analyst | Research Fund Administration | Budget & Compliance

profile.description: Accomplished Finance Analyst with extensive experience in research fund administration, budgeting, compliance, and reporting within post-secondary institutions. Proven ability to deliver accurate reporting, optimize financial processes and support complex research projects. Recognized for strong work ethic, effective communication, and cross-functional collaboration.
